bibl.title: Antoninus the kÒrufow (Note on P. Oxy. XLVI 3298.2). <koruphos>
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XLVI, 3298 (horoscope, later IIIrd cent. A.D.), 2: b (¶touw) ÉAntvne€nou toË korÊf(ou). It seems preferable to understand kÒrufow/kÒroifow as ı oﬁf«n tåw kÒraw rather than as ı …w kÒrh oﬁf≈menow. The description agrees with the known facts about the life of Elagabalus. The word kÒrufow occurs also in P. Tebt. II, 414, 7 (private letter, II cent. A.D.). <b (etous) Antoneinou tou koruph(ou), koruphos / koroiphos, ho oiphon tas koras, ho hos kore oiphomenos>
